p: The the said imprisionment, detention and restraint is illegal and that the illegality thereof consists in this to wit; First That the amount of this Bond penalty to wit; the sum of $1000.00 is excessive request and opressive and Plaintiff is unable to give a Bond for such an amount Second That no trial has been had on said charge and the complaint on which this Plaintiff has been arrested,has not been examined into by any offices duly qualified and that the said complaint and charge is untrue Third That said Plaintiff was arrested on the 21t day of May 1875 at 10 o clock a. m. and at that time the examination was adjourned for five days to wit; until the 26th day at 9 o clock a. m. on which day Plaintiff appeased in court and demanded that his examination or trial be had or that he be discharged from custody but not withstanding thesaid examination was further adjourned for more than ten days in all to wit; until the first day of June 1875 at 9 o clock a. m. where upon Plaintiff
